product_name: Mario BadescuGlycolic Acid Toner with Grapefruit & Aloe
summary: SummaryMario Badescu's Glycolic Acid Toner is an anti-aging toner with Glycolic Acid, Grapefruit, and Aloe. This toner is alcohol-free mild resurfacing, exfoliating toner that brightens and balances skin post-cleanse.
details: DetailsBenefitsAlcohol-freeMild resurfacing, exfoliating tonerBrightens and balances skin post-cleanseHelps refine the look of pores and diminish the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles, and uneven skin tonePromotes a more radiant and even, youthful-looking complexionItem 2210021How To UseTwice daily after cleansing, apply to skin with a cotton ball or pad. Wipe in sweeping, outward motions until the cotton comes up clean. Avoid eye area. If product gets into eyes, rinse well with water.Not recommended for use with topical prescriptions, acne-erupted, or sensitive skin. Avoid contact with the eyes. If contact occurs, rinse well with water. If irritation develops and persists, discontinue use. Sunburn Alert: This product contains an alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) that may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Use a sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterwards.IngredientsAqua (Water, Eau), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Propylene Glycol, Glycolic Acid, Triethanolamine, Polysorbate 20, Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Fruit Extract, Diazolidinyl Urea, Benzophenone-4, Methylparaben, Parfum (Fragrance), PEG-8, Trimethoxybenzylidene Pentanedione, Hydroxyacetophenone, Propylparaben, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Chloride, Linalool, Hexyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Alcohol, Limonene, Citronellol, Geraniol, CI 42090 (Blue 1), CI 45410 (Red 28), CI 19140 (Yellow 5)Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Twice daily after cleansing, apply to skin with a cotton ball or pad. Wipe in sweeping, outward motions until the cotton comes up clean. Avoid eye area. If product gets into eyes, rinse well with water.Not recommended for use with topical prescriptions, acne-erupted, or sensitive skin. Avoid contact with the eyes. If contact occurs, rinse well with water. If irritation develops and persists, discontinue use. Sunburn Alert: This product contains an alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) that may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Use a sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterwards.

reviews.headline: I would bye the toner again
reviews.comments: This is the second time I bought it and it makes my face feel so clean.

reviews.headline: best toner
reviews.comments: okay i usually dont use toners because i feel like they dont do anything on my skin but this toner right here is amazing! ive seen a difference within the first couple days. leaves your skin looking healthy and clear!! definetly reccomend

reviews.headline: Guarantee Breakout
reviews.comments: It has burn my skin. Breakout in My face and neck

reviews.headline: Ruined My Almost Perfect Complexion
reviews.comments: I switched all facial care January  2024. I haven't had breakouts like this since I was between 12 and 16! I returned it today *March 2024* for the Witch Hazel and Rose Water and hopefully this corrects the problem. My skin is of the normal sensitive type but this caused an influx of oil.

reviews.headline: Works perfect
reviews.comments: I was told if you're over 40, you should be using a toner twice a day. I am amazed at the results and wish I had started sooner!

reviews.headline: Toners aren't worth it
reviews.comments: I didn't notice any change in my skin's texture or pore size at all while using this for almost a month. It actually was making my skin oilier than when I wasn't using any toner at all.

reviews.headline: On line purchase
reviews.comments: Purchased on line and received half the bottle. Top of the bottle was not taped and half the liquid was in the baggie.

reviews.headline: Solid but not perfect
reviews.comments:
Unfortunately, this contains fragrance and colorants. But otherwise it's nice, gentle glycolic toner.
It's not as effective as some of the stronger glycolic toners or pads, but it does not irritate my sensitive skin, and works well to keep it clear.  And you can't beat the price!

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again.
reviews.comments: This is the best product I have used so far in diminishing dark spots.  It seems to take a long time to get completely rid of them.

reviews.headline: Does nothing for my face
reviews.comments: If you like just wiping blue water all over your face, than go for it. It doesn't do anything, literally. It's just like water.

reviews.headline: Love the product
reviews.comments: First time using this product and love it

reviews.headline: I'm so happy I found this toner!
reviews.comments: Day 2 & this toner makes me feel great when I see my glowing skin!  I see immediate positive results!  I really like this skin care line!

reviews.headline: Perfect
reviews.comments: This is a real toner, not an "essence" that's become so popular. This MB w/Glycolic Acid works wonderfully for my acne & scar prone skin that's nearing 40. It brightens & leaves my skin looking healthy w/o over drying. All the MD toners work well.

reviews.headline: Buy in bulk & refill small bottles
reviews.comments: Love it. Used it for a year. I'm 44 and I enjoy that this makes me feel complete for my skin routine. I use it 4 to 5 days a week.

reviews.headline: If you miss the 80s...
reviews.comments: This is actually a toxic blue color, not the muted green shown in the picture. It contains a ton of artificial colors (check ingredients). It burns the skin and is reminiscent of skincare in the 80s...back when we thought rubbing a lemon dipped in salt on our face was a good idea lol

reviews.headline: Love this toner!
reviews.comments: I have been using this toner for years now. It's the only product that has helped prevent little acne breakouts. It got rid of little acne bumps I had on my forehead. After cleansing & toner, it makes my face feel nice and clean. I use Mario Badescu's ace face wash. Best combo for face wash & toner!

reviews.headline: Effective and budget friendly
reviews.comments: I have been using this toner for years. It is affordable, yet effective. It has diminished the texture on my skin. Highly recommend.

reviews.headline: FAVORITE
reviews.comments: I have used this for over 20 years back when it was Aqua Glycolic. It is effective in controlling acne. I even used it one summer to ease the discomfort of poison ivy.

reviews.headline: amazing product
reviews.comments: currently use this with the glycolic foaming cleanser and i love the results. my acne scars are hardly visible.

reviews.headline: Nothing special
reviews.comments: It didn't seem to do anything to be honest

faceoff_positive.comments: This stuff is AMAZING! I'm one of those people who didn't even think about toner because I never saw the point in it. I have acne prone, dry skin and before I started using this I was using 2.5% benzoyl peroxide which did wonders for my skin! Well I decided to skip my benzoyl peroxide one night (used toner in the morning and peroxide at night) and I expected my skin to be covered in pimples the next morning, but my skin was so clear. So I started skipping it more and more and only using the toner along with my cleaner, hylauranic acid, and moisturizer and my skin is still clear! I never knew anything else would work fr my skin, but I'm glad this does. Plus it smells great and keeps my skin looking glowy.
faceoff_positive.headline: Love this stuff!!

faceoff_negative.comments: First of all, I love Mario Badescu products!  They are very reasonably priced and work as well as philosophy or dermalogica without the hefty price tag.  This toner, however, burned my skin.  I used it for about 2 weeks thinking that maybe I just needed to give it some time.  The skin around my nose actually became hard, flaky and red.  It looked and felt like a terrible sunburn.  Eventually that look spread around more areas of my face.  The glycolic acid in this toner is too potent!!!  I do not have particularly sensitive skin, so this surprised me.  My face was so painful and continued to burn for hours after use.  After I quit using it, my skin returned to normal.  I use the Alpha-Grapefruit cleansing lotion now and I absolutely LOVE it!!!
faceoff_negative.headline: OUCH!!!

rollup.name: Glycolic Acid Toner with Grapefruit & Aloe
